MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L11 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Willow Way and surrounding streets. Apologies for previously stating that the power cut was restored, our team are continuing to work on the underground cable network to restore supplies as quickly and as safely as possible by MIDNIGHT. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.21PM on 1st December 2020.
